post:
Evolution Host offer exceptionally high quality [VPS hosting](https://evolution-host.com/vps.php) at an unbeatable price. Quality, enterprise grade hardware is the only option for your hosting needs. We understand the importance of delivering a highly reliable service with excellent customer support.

At Evolution Host, you get what you pay for. All resources are guaranteed and are **yours**. We do not throttle or limit your CPU if you use the resources that you are paying for, this ensures that you receive consistent performance - a necessity for production environments. Our servers are **never** over-sold to ensure that each and every client receives their allocated resources.

**All VPS Include**  
• **KVM** Virtualization  
• 65, 535 IPv6 Addresses  
• **Instant** Setup  
• Advanced DDoS Protection  
• 99.95% uptime SLA  
• Unbeatable customer support **including live support**  
• Upgrade at any time  
• VNC access - useful for troubleshooting!  
• Reinstall your OS at any time  
• Full **root** access  
• Add additional IPv4 addresses at any time

**Starter VPS**  
1 vCPU  
512MB RAM  
50GB Disk Space  
200Mb/s Port  
1TB Monthly Transfer  
Cost: €4.99/mo  
Order now: https://evolution-host.com/vps.php

**Available Locations**  
• Roubaix, France | Test IP: 37.187.161.197  
• Montreal, Canada | Test IP: 167.114.158.70  
• Las Vegas, USA | Test IP: 104.194.26.138

**Operating Systems**

• Fedora 20 x86  
• Fedora 20 x64

• CentOS 6.6 x86  
• CentOS 6.6 x64

• Scientific 7.1 x64  
• Fedora 21 x64

• Debian 8.0 x86  
• Ubuntu 15.04 x64  
• Ubuntu 15.04 x86  
• Windows Server 2012 R2  
• Windows Server 2008 R2  
Need another OS? [Contact us](mailto:support@evolution-host.com)!

**Contact our Staff**  
If you have any questions, our staff will be more than happy to assist you.
You can contact us by sending an email to [support@evolution-host.com](mailto:support@evolution-host.com) or via live support on the website: https://evolution-host.com/

Exchange rates at time of posting indicate that €4.99 is $5.48.
